title: Venus is the Second Planet from the Sun
fact: Venus is the second planet from the Sun, orbiting at an average distance of about 108 million kilometers (about 67 million miles).

title: Venus is Similar in Size to Earth
fact: Venus is often referred to as Earth's 'sister planet' because it is very similar in size, with a diameter of about 12,104 kilometers (7,520 miles), only slightly smaller than Earth's diameter.
